SELECT hire_announcement_no AS hireAnnouncementNo cpmember_id AS cpmemberId hire_announcement_title AS hireAnnouncementTitle hire_announcement_recruitment_field AS hireAnnouncementRecuitmentField hire_announcement_career AS hireAnnouncementCareer hire_announcement_manager AS hireAnnouncementManager hire_announcement_contents AS hireAnnouncementContents hire_announcement_education AS hireAnnouncementEducation hire_announcement_jobgrade AS hireAnnouncementJobgrade hire_announcement_jobposition AS hireAnnouncementJobPosition hire_announcement_preferential_conditions AS hireAnnouncementPreferentialConditions hire_announcement_salary AS hireAnnouncementSalary hire_announcement_working_form_name AS hireAnnouncementWorkingFormName hire_announcement_start_date AS hireAnnouncementStartDate hire_announcement_end_date AS hireAnnouncementEndDate FROM linkjobs_hire_announcement WHERE hire_announcement_no = #{hireAnnouncementNo}
